snippet.textDisplay: Ahhhh the memories. Shenmue was one of those rare games you 'lived'. Never played anything as engrossing, with the exception of FF7. Playing it at xmas time in the mid 00's. Nostalgia!

snippet.textDisplay: Ever since I moved to Florida from Michigan, the thing I miss more than anything is snow.  Everytime I hear this song I feel it though.  It's incredible how VGM affects things well into our real lives.

snippet.textDisplay:
Unfortunately, I never had the oppotunity to play this game but I can remember myself staring at TVs in videogame stores when this game was on. 

On the other hand, I do own the OST of the first game in the series, and I think it's absolutely precious (although quite short!).
snippet.textOriginal:
Unfortunately, I never had the oppotunity to play this game but I can remember myself staring at TVs in videogame stores when this game was on. 

On the other hand, I do own the OST of the first game in the series, and I think it's absolutely precious (although quite short!).

snippet.textDisplay:
Never heard of this game.
That track has a nice soothing atmosphere that not just suits Christmas. In fact, i wouldn't have guessed it's supposed to be a Christmas track if it wasn't stated in the title.
Although the chimes at the end make you think of a cold lit-up night in an old town with a church near by. But that's just my culturally biased mind thinking here :P
snippet.textOriginal:
Never heard of this game.
That track has a nice soothing atmosphere that not just suits Christmas. In fact, i wouldn't have guessed it's supposed to be a Christmas track if it wasn't stated in the title.
Although the chimes at the end make you think of a cold lit-up night in an old town with a church near by. But that's just my culturally biased mind thinking here :P

snippet.textDisplay: A purely atmospheric track. I've already said in one of my previous uploads, but the Shenmue series is one of my favorites of all time, easily in my Top 10. Probably the most engrossing games I've played. I miss this series, I'll have  to replay both games to get my Shenmue fix.
snippet.textOriginal: A purely atmospheric track. I've already said in one of my previous uploads, but the Shenmue series is one of my favorites of all time, easily in my Top 10. Probably the most engrossing games I've played. I miss this series, I'll have  to replay both games to get my Shenmue fix.
